Today our team member [Marcos Dominguez](/author/marcos-dominguez/) successfully defended his PhD, titled "Road to a Healthier Mexico: The influence of price signals, information, stress and consciousness on food choices" at Wageningen University in the Netherlands. Congrats Marcos!
